Informieren Sie sich mit der SRF Meteo App schnell und einfach über das Wetter in der Schweiz und der ganzen Welt. Speichern Sie Ihre Lieblingsorte als Favoriten und behalten Sie das Wetter stets im Überblick. Der Meteo Niederschlagsradar zeigt Ihnen die Entwicklung der letzten sowie der kommenden Stunde und im 48h Modell. Während den Wintermonaten finden Sie in der SRF Meteo App die Schneewetter-Karte mit aktueller Schneehöhe, Neuschneehöhe und Lawinengefahr, herausgegeben vom Institut für Schnee- und Lawinenforschung SLF. Mit dem dreimal täglich aktualisierten Wetterbericht der SRF Meteo Redaktion sind Sie stets auf dem Laufenden über die Wetterprognose für die Schweiz. Täglich neues, spannendes rund ums Wetter finden Sie in den Meteo-Stories. Mit über 40 in der ganzen Schweiz verteilten Webcams machen Sie sich ein Bild über das aktuelle Wetter. Bei Wetterextremen an Ihren bevorzugten Schweizer Orten und Ihrem Standort werden Sie per Pushmeldungen und direkt in der App mithilfe der Wetterwarnungen gewarnt.

With Weather-Alarm you always receive precise weather forecasts for Switzerland and Liechtenstein where you are warned of severe weather free of charge. Thanks to high-resolution webcams, interactive maps and useful information on temperature, precipitation, humidity, wind, snow and sunshine duration, the weather becomes predictable for you.

THE TOP FEATURES OF WEATHER-ALARM

● Current weather & weather forecast
● Warnings of severe weather
● Personal weather alerts
● Radar for severe weather, rain, wind & snow
● Webcams with live weather in real time
● Weather forecast for events
● Safety tips & blog
● Weather widgets including thermometer

CURRENT WEATHER & WEATHER PROGNOSIS

With Weather-Alarm you get local and regional weather forecasts for today and tomorrow, as well as weather outlooks for the entire week at the touch of a button. This way you always stay informed about the current weather and the weather outlook. In addition, the daily forecasts inform you about the current moon phase. With this compact lunar calendar, 
you will definitely not miss the next full moon.

CURRENT WEATHER CONDITIONS AND FORECAST	

Besides the current weather report with hourly weather forecast for today and 6 further days, a storm map, wind map, flood map and flash and rain radar provide detailed information on the weather outlook. With information on temperature, flow and water levels, Weather-Alarm also provides information on the condition of streams, rivers and lakes. Whether spring, summer, autumn or winter, the Weather-Alarm app is your ideal companion in every season.

WEATHER ALERTS

Your safety is important to us! With Weather-Alarm, you can be conveniently warned of severe weather. You decide what kind of severe weather and at what danger level you would like to be warned. Whether heavy rain, wind, storm, high water, frost, ice, snowfall, thunderstorms or hail, Weather-Alarm reliably warns you of natural hazards.

PERSONAL WEATHER ALERTS

With Weather Alarm, you can set up weather notifications according to your needs. This function is ideal for not being surprised by a change in the weather on your way to work or during your leisure time. The 172 warning regions in Switzerland and Liechtenstein allow us to provide area-wide and precise warnings.

WEBCAMS WITH LIVE WEATHER

Explore the weather in Switzerland in real time. Weather-Alarm offers high-resolution, zoomable panoramic pictures of over 300 webcams (restaurants, airports, hotels, ski resorts, mountain peaks, excursion destinations). Thanks to the altitude data of the live cams, you always know the snowfall as well as the fog line and also the weather conditions in ski resorts. Conveniently check the ski weather for your trip to the snow.

WEATHER AT EVENTS

Weather-Alarm informs you about outdoor events via push notification. Add the event to your favorites and select your visit date. Organizers can register their event free of charge at: https://wetteralarm.ch/events/veranstaltungen.html

WEATHER WIDGETS

Place the Weather-Alarm widget on the home screen of your smartphone or tablet to see the weather and storm information without having to open the app. This function can be used as a thermometer.

SAFETY TIPS & BLOG

To help you avoid damage caused by severe weather, we provide useful safety tips and prevention measures. You can also find even more knowledge on the topic of weather directly in the app via the menu item "Blog".

SHARE ALERTS & IMAGES FROM WEBCAMS

Warn your loved ones by sharing severe weather warnings via messenger, email and social networks or forward impressive images from live cams and personal alerts.

Weather-Alarm is a free service from Kantonale Gebäudeversicherungen with weather data supplied by SRF Meteo and Meteo Swiss.

The app combines highly accurate weather forecast for your location with a 3D map showing development of weather in a broader area in a very interesting way. This allows you to see where precipitation is going to come from or where the wind is blowing from. The uniqueness of the app comes from the amount of data displayed. Forecast of weather, precipitation, wind, cloud cover, atmospheric pressure, snow cover and other meteorological data for different altitudes is available for the whole world. 

WIND ANIMATION
The Ventusky application solves weather displaying in an interesting way. Wind is displayed using streamlines which clearly portray the continuous development of weather. Airflow on Earth is always in motion and the streamlines depict this motion in an amazing way. This makes the interconnection of all atmospheric phenomena obvious.

WEATHER FORECAST
Weather forecast for the first three days is available in the app in one-hour steps. For other days, it’s available in three-hour steps. Users can also look up sunrise and sunrise times in a given place or air quality.

WEATHER MODELS
Thanks to the Ventusky application, visitors get data directly from the numerical models that, just a few years ago, were used solely by meteorologists. The app collects data from the most accurate numerical models. Besides the well-known data from the American GFS and HRRR models, it also displays data from the Canadian GEM model and the German ICON model, which is unique thanks to its high resolution for the whole world. Two models, EURAD and USRAD, are based on current radar and satellite readings. These models are able to show precisely current precipitation in US and Europe.

WEATHER FRONTS
You can also display weather fronts. We have created a neural network that predicts the positions of cold, warm, occluded, and stationary fronts based on data from weather models. This algorithm is unique, and we are the first on the world who makes global fronts forecast available to users.

LIST OF WEATHER LAYERS
• Temperature (16 levels)
• Temperature anomaly
• Perceived temperature
• Precipitation (1 hour, 3 hour, long time accumulation)
• Radar
• Satellite
• Wind gusts (1 hour, long time maximum)

APPLE WATCH

You want to know what your flat or house is doing right now - with the MOBILE ALERTS home monitoring system you can easily find out about its condition:

- Are all windows and doors closed?
- Is the freezer cold enough?
- Can I leave the washing machine running unattended?
- Has the power failed?

All these questions will be answered in the future by the MOBILE ALERTS home monitoring system in this practical app in combination with various wireless sensors for your home. All you need to operate this app is the necessary hardware, consisting of the gateway and at least one sensor of your choice (e.g. MOBILE ALERTS Starterkit MA 10001 Set) and an internet connection.

Via the Internet connection and the gateway, the MOBILE ALERTS app enables you to call up all the information from your home on your smartphone anywhere in the world. The sensors permanently monitor the current data and report malfunctions automatically and immediately via push notification to your smartphone, whereby greater damage can be avoided by targeted action. 

The simple installation enables every user to monitor the house at any time in just 5 steps:
Once you have downloaded the permanently free MOBILE ALERTS app from the Appstore, it is immediately ready for use after installation thanks to Plug&Play.
A personal registration is not necessary.
Now connect the gateway to the power supply unit and your router.
Then insert batteries in the selected wireless sensors.
Open the app, scan in the codes of the wireless sensors and you can access all the recorded data with your smartphone and check the current status of your home - anytime, anywhere.
The whole process is completed within 2 minutes at the latest.

Se cerchi un’applicazione Meteo gratuita, bella, rapida, facile da utilizzare, e soprattutto precisa e puntuale nelle previsioni del tempo, la nuova release dell’app “Meteo” del Centro Meteo italiano è l’applicazione che fa parte te ! 

Completamente rinnovata nel layout grafico e nelle funzionalità l’applicazione è stata progettata per rendere l’esperienza di navigazione dell’utente efficace, efficiente e soddisfacente secondo le tre “regole auree” dell’usabilità. 

“Meteo” del Centro Meteo Italiano offre previsioni del tempo ad alta affidabilità, riferite ai comuni, alle località di mare e montagna in Italia e nel Mondo, direttamente sul tuo smartphone o tablet Android, con informazioni fino a 14 giorni e aggiornamenti dati in tempo reale. 

Le previsioni giornaliere sono fornite anche con il dettaglio orario, per darti, ora per ora, il massimo delle informazioni, come lo stato del cielo, temperature minime e massime, venti, zero termico, quota neve e le allerte dei principali fenomeni meteorologici. 

La funzionalità “Meteo Viaggi" ti permette di calcolare il percorso per raggiungere una meta conoscendo in anticipo le condizioni meteo durante tutto il tragitto con gli orari dei passaggi. Tale funzione è valida anche per viaggi all'estero!
La funzionalità “Allerta Meteo” è stata completamente ripensata per una migliore fruibilità da parte dell’utente. Grazie al servizio di “allerte meteo” potrai essere comodamente aggiornato, in tempo reale, sulle condizioni meteo riguardanti gli eventi da te inseriti, attraverso la ricezione di notifiche push. Senza necessità di consultare le previsioni, la App di Centro Meteo Italiano ti avviserà in caso di fenomeni meteo interferenti con il tuo "evento".
Con la funzione “WebCam” potrai vedere in tempo reale lo stato del cielo dei diversi comuni italiani, consultando migliaia di webcam in continuo aggiornamento.
L'applicazione, infine, è completa di radar, satelliti e mappe previsionali, una finestra sui cambiamenti meteo in nowcasting o per scoprire gli scenari futuri. 
“Meteo” del Centro Meteo italiano ti permette inoltre di salvare le tue località preferite e di poterle scorrere comodamente in modalità “swipe”. L’applicazione è dotata inoltre di sistema di georeferenziazione per fornirti in maniera precisa e tempestiva le previsioni del tempo in base alla tua posizione.

AuroraReach app is an aurora tracking, forecasting and alerting app that gives local aurora visibility scores for cities around the world. We take weather conditions like cloud cover, visibility, time of day etc. along with aurora score to generate a score that can help you find the aurora visibility times for a gives city. Along with aurora, weather conditions are also predicted for up to 4 days. We also let users checkin an aurora sighting and alert based on that.

We track ~24K cities around the world for aurora activity and weather conditions. It is easy to get started by subscribing to alerts for multiple cities and get alerted on the app for free. Realtime aurora map shows the aurora activity on the map and you can interact with the map to select the cities we are tracking from map and having activity at that time. Aurora Travel destination searching is easier with this and with our city search page you can search by city or country for viewing the city aurora forecast report and subscribe to cities for alerts. You can favorite the cities for quick accesses in the future even if you are not registered with an account.

As we track city specific aurora scores, we cover cities under the northern lights (aurora borealis), southern lights (aurora australis) and even cities where aurora hasn't occurred till date. Web page has sighting specific pages to chat on realtime aurora sighting, this will be released soon in the app version too. 

Enjoy hunting auroras with AuroraReach and find your next aurora destination with this app.
